description: Tanya Moss jewelry lines are sophisticated accessory options for the modern woman.
Tarjama combines machine-learning technology and top human talent to provide reliable, efficient, and accurate language services for enterprises of all sizes.
Taste is a South African restaurant management group with a portfolio of mostly franchised, category specialist and formula driven, quick service restaurant and retail brands.
Tecnovax develops and manufactures innovative biological products for the prevention and eradication of infectious diseases in animals, yielding higher livestock output, reproduction, and longevity.
TECSAÚDE delivers quick and efficient clinical engineering solutions to hospitals.
TecVerde specializes in the intelligent design and industrialized construction of sustainable wood frame houses which simplify the process of building a property and reduce waste generation.
Tekton Labs provides software innovation and consulting services to firms across multiple industries.

Tembici is the leading micro-mobility player in Latin America, offering a docked bike-sharing platform that provides first and last-mile transportation solutions to daily commuters as well as space management services for bicycle parking.
Tempest provides end-to-end security solutions for enterprise clients.
Territorium enables college students and corporate employees to track skill development, then follow-up on goals through courses and experiences recommended by a proprietary algorithm.
Tes América provides customized, industry-specific strategic services and solutions involving the design, optimization, and monitoring of wireless telecommunication networks.
Thais is a remote monitoring company that enhances care for complex chronic disease patients.
The Bakery Shop is a food service company that offers baked goods through retail outlets and supermarkets.

description: The Box is a self-storage company offering end-to-end moving and storage solutions to both individual and commercial clients. The company uses proprietary software that provides up-to-date reporting on capacity levels and outstanding payments.

The Coffee House is the fastest-growing coffee chain in Vietnam. It embraces local culture while bringing world-class experience at affordable prices. Living by its mantra of “Delivering Wow and Happiness,” the company serves over 100,000 customers daily.
The Goods Group, a chain of multi-label stores, offers fashion and lifestyle products from local and international brands.
The Lip Bar creates non-toxic, vegan, cruelty-free makeup that looks good on every complexion.
The Qode is a luxury-focused PR & digital marketing events company servicing the Middle East.
The Training Room Online (TTRO) is a learning technology company focused on customizing cutting edge digital learning solutions.
The Urban Haus is a regional fashion house in the fast fashion retail casual & denim market.
